column5: Simard Lake and Guoin Res. Caesars North Camps, great trip, great outfitter  this little guy has some blue    a fallfish    a double    the camp mascot    this pic made the cover of Caesars brochure, sorry about the hold    a craddle would have helped    coming out a little scruffier, time for a shower
Awesome report:Gonefishing:  Nice fish, but that Pike is a real Brute !!!
Thanks for the great report. Hope your back heals up quickly.
Nice to see you post some pic's Chris! Looks like fun.
Looks like a nice trip. It was nice to see a groundhog, don't see many of those around anymore.
Nice to reflect on past trips.   I need to get me into some of those monster pike someday.
Hmmm Beaver never gets old! Looked like a GREAT trip!!
Thanks for sharing your pics.  Always nice to see fishing reports from Quebec.
Love that bluey!!!  Doesn't look like a blue slimer but more like a true blue.
yeah, the Beaver is classic, the Otter is great too because a party of 4 can bring in alot of beer!
Very nice #1 picture.Good luck with the back.
Great Pic's hope ya feel better soon... backs are a bugger....
